value.description: Bind value, select the name of the tab
value.description_zh: 绑定值，选中选项卡的 name

:v-model.description: Bind value, select the name of the tab
:v-model.description_zh: 绑定值，选中选项卡的 name

closable.description: Whether the label can be closed

addable.description: Whether the label can be increased

editable.description: Whether labels can be added and closed at the same time
editable.description_zh: 标签是否同时可增加和关闭

stretch.description: Whether the width of the label is self-propping
stretch.description_zh: 标签的宽度是否自撑开

:before-leave.description: If the hook before the toggle tag returns false or returns a Promise and is rejected, the toggle is blocked.
:before-leave.description_zh: 切换标签之前的钩子，若返回 false 或者返回 Promise 且被 reject，则阻止切换。

events.name: tab-click
events.params: 被选中的标签 tab 实例

events.name: tab-remove
events.description: Triggered by clicking the tab remove button
events.description_zh: 点击 tab 移除按钮后触发

events.name: tab-add
events.description: It is triggered when you click the Add button for tabs
events.description_zh: 点击 tabs 的新增按钮后触发

events.name: edit
events.description: Clicks the Add button on tabs or triggers when tabs are closed
events.description_zh: 点击 tabs 的新增按钮或 tab 被关闭后触发
